subject: p19182863
History: Right pleural effusion after thoracentesis, to check for pneumothorax and reexpansion.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there has been removal of a substantial amount of right pleural fluid. There has been re-expansion of the ipsilateral lung with no evidence of pneumothorax. Continued enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with some engorgement of pulmonary vessels consistent with elevated pulmonary venous pressure.
